HediffDef.label: fogger
HediffDef.description: A distributed cloud of mechanites is interwoven with the DNA of the carrier. These mechanites have the ability of influencing the humidity levels of the surrounding atmosphere, causing a deep, thick fog to coalesce around.

HediffDef.label: rainmaker
HediffDef.description: A distributed cloud of mechanites is interwoven with the DNA of the carrier. These mechanites have the ability of drastically lowering the atmospheric pressure around, causing constant precipitation.
